bury.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to put something under the ground, often in order to hide it

bury.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: to ignore a feeling or memory and pretend that it does not exist
bury.translation[0].definitions[5].defin: to push something, especially something sharp, into something else with a lot of force
bury.translation[0].definitions[5].examp: The dog buried its teeth in my leg.

bury.translation[0].definitions[6].defin: to put information in a document in a place where it is unlikely to be noticed, or to not make it available to people

bury.translation[0].definitions[7].defin: to have someone you love die
